metadata.Title: CVE-2021-30473 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
aom_image.c in libaom in AOMedia before 2021-04-07 frees memory that is not located on the heap.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-30473` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1
libaom0 - 1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.0.errata1-3+deb11u1build0.20.04.1').
